aiSchedule.title: AI Schedule Creator
aiSchedule.description: Answer a few questions about your work and preferences to generate an optimal availability schedule

workHours.label: What are your typical work hours?
workHours.help: This helps us avoid scheduling during your busy work time
workHours.audioPrompt: Please tell me your typical work hours. For example, 9 AM to 5 PM.

workDays.label: Which days do you typically work?
workDays.help: Select all days when you're usually busy with work
workDays.audioPrompt: Which days do you typically work? You can say the days like Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday.

availabilityNotes.label: Any special availability notes or constraints?
availabilityNotes.placeholder: e.g., I'm not available on weekends, I prefer longer blocks of time, I need time for lunch between 12-1 PM...
availabilityNotes.help: Optional: Tell us about any specific scheduling preferences
availabilityNotes.audioPrompt: Do you have any special availability notes or scheduling constraints? This is optional, you can say skip if you don't have any.

aiSchedule.missingInfoDesc: Please fill in work hours and work days to generate your schedule.
aiSchedule.smartCompleteDesc: This schedule was created based on your work hours, preferences, and availability constraints. Click 'Apply & Save Schedule' to save it to your profile.
aiSchedule.generationSuccessDesc: Your personalized availability schedule has been created!
aiSchedule.microphoneErrorDesc: Please allow microphone access to use voice input.
